cards.card_name: Performer of Desire_FLP // Pyrus, the Undying Flame_FLP
cards.rules_text: {1}{R}: Performer of Desire gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. Then if its power is 4 or greater, you may transform it.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“So young Pyrus could not be glad
Until at last the most he had...”
[/i]
cards.card_name2: Performer of Desire_FLP // Pyrus, the Undying Flame_FLP
cards.rules_text2:
Flying, haste
Whenever Pyrus, the Undying Flame attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{R}. You don't lose this mana as steps, phases, and turns end.
{1}{R}: Pyrus gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text2:
[i]“But when his greed had reached its height,
the beast he had become took flight.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: {U}{B}, {T}: Draw a card, then each player exiles the top card of their library. Then if a player owns two or more cards exiled with Arina, Volarian Explorer, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.
cards.rules_text2:
[+1]: Tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
[-2]: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 blue and black Elemental creature token.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “You may play cards from exile.”
